Entries.companionAccepted: Of course I'll go with you, @. Exploring in pairs is a much safer bet than going alone.$11
Entries.companionRejected: Sorry, @. I've got a full plate today - maybe next time, though.$4
Entries.companionRejectedNight: It's late, @. You probably shouldn't start a mines trek this far into the day. Maybe find something else to do.$17
Entries.companionDismiss: Haha, that was a pretty good run, @. Get home safe, alright? See you next time.$1
Entries.companionDismissAuto: We had some pretty solid adventures today, @. But we both probably need the shut-eye. Have a good night, alright?$19
Entries.companionRecruited: So, what are you feeling today? Skull Cave? Regular Mines? Oh, maybe we could go to Ginger Island-!$1
Entries.companionSuggest: Hey, @!#$q -1 -1#How about we do a little bit of dungeon delving?#$r -1 0 Yes#Sure, let's go!#$r -1 0 No#Can't right now, maybe later?
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Thanks for bringing me along, @! Hope I can be of service.$1
Entries.companionSuggest_No: Maybe next time! Be careful, if you wind up exploring alone.$10
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: I'm always up for going out and about with you, Sunshine.$18
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: I'm a bit swamped with some Guild logistics, can we try another time? I'm sorry, Sunshine.$2
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: Sunshine... It's a bit late, but I'm open to other plans.$19
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: I'm thankful for some time spent, Sunshine. See you soon, have a good rest of your day.$18
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: Today's been really great, but I've got to go feed Emeritus real quick or he'll burn the Guild down.$7
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: You and me, together for adventures. I love the sound of that.$19
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Hey, Sunshine!#$q -1 -1#How about you and I spend some time, swords drawn?#$r -1 0 Yes#Sure, let's go!#$r -1 0 No#Can't right now, maybe later?
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: I'd never say no to you, Sunshine. Let's make today something worth remembering.
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: %Mateo ignores you. You think to yourself that it might be better to rekindle your relationship first.
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: It's so late...I could think of some horizontal activities we could do instead.$19
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: See you at home! Give %pet extra kisses for me when you get back.$10
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: It's bedtime... you're welcome to stay up, but don't keep me waiting too long, alright?$16
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: What's on the docket for today, Sunshine?$11
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: Hey... I'm up for a little bit of time spent, if you are.#$q -1 -1#Spend the day with me, Sunshine?#$r -1 0 Yes#Absolutely, let's go!#$r -1 0 No#Love ya, Moonbeam, but I can't today.
Entries.companion_Farm: So if I told you I'd broken into your barns and coops multiple times to pet the animals, would you still consider me a friend?$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: You know, part of me doesn't believe I deserve the life we have here.$18#$b#But hey, I'm gonna enjoy it while I have it. And I'm gonna enjoy you too, however you'll have me.
Entries.companion_Mine: I get worried whenever people come down here. It's not that I think they're not capable - I just know it's dangerous.$17#$b#Please be careful. Always.$17
Entries.companion_Mine_Spouse: I love you. And part of loving you is worrying about you...$17#$b#Don't ever hesitate to have me come down here with you, @. I want to be around to protect you.$18
Entries.companion_Town_Night: I love how the town looks when it's dark out, but the lights inside are all still on...it's so...homey.$14
Entries.companion_Town_Fall: Pumpkin season, pumpkin season, pumpkin season!1$#$b#I'm so excited. It's the best time of year! The leaves, the air, the snacks-!$11
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: ...I love the rain... can we stay outside?$10
Entries.companion_SkullCave: Are you sure you want to do this, @? Here... take this just in case. [349]$14
Entries.companion_SkullCave_Spouse: Take this tonic, Sunshine. I have a few of them on me.[349]$17#$b#If anything goes sideways, run for the ladder. No excuses or exceptions. I'm saying this as the Guildmaster and as your spouse.$19
Entries.companion_Custom_EastScarpeInn: I haven't seen Rosa in a bit. I should come here more often, play some pool.$14
Entries.companion_Custom_EastScarpeInn_Spouse: Rosa caught me running an extension cord from the Inn to the tent, once. She was not happy.$7
Entries.companion_Custom_ESVetHouse: ...Eloise is one of the most brilliant children I've ever met... Jacob's raising her right.$19#$b#Anyway, can we stop and pet the llamas? Please?$12
Entries.companion_Custom_CrimsonBadlands: This is a living nightmare. Everything's corrupted, @. Let's not join the ranks of those fallen adventurers. Take this, just in case. [349]$17
Entries.companion_Custom_CrimsonBadlands_Spouse: We have too much of a life at home... I'm not sure it's worth the risk. But if you want to keep going... take this at least.[349]$17
Entries.companion_Custom_ESDeepMountains: I feel...at home, here. I can't explain why. Not only that, but I feel like someone is watching us... anyway, let's go play with the Void Goats for a little while.$17
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: I love being up on the mountain. I should visit here more often than just for the festivals. The view from the skycar is amazing...$10
If I didn't know any better, I would say you came up here with me just because you wanted a private moment in the skycar.$16
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest: Be careful, @... I'm not well acquainted with this place, but it seems dangerous...
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgeForest_S: Sunshine, be careful. Take this just in case. [349]
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_SummitFarm_Sp: How many farms do you have-? Damn, I really married up.$16
Entries.companion_Custom_ESMateoHome: Admittedly, this is not the most attractive setup for someone to see.$7
Entries.companion_Custom_ESCoastalGuild: I'm really proud of everything this represents... thank you for helping me build it. It means the world of me to have a space like this to call my own.$14
Entries.companion_Custom_ESCoastalGuild_Spouse: While we're here, let me check up on Emeritus. He's pretty solitary, considering he lives on a diet of crabs...$19
Entries.companion_Custom_ESDeepDark: It's dangerous down here, @. Haunted, even. This place has a sordid history ... Let's be very careful.$17
Entries.companion_Custom_ESEDHouse: Soot is so soft. Let me just... sit here and play with him for a while.$12
Entries.companion_Custom_ARVHouse: Oooh, are we here to see Maximum? C'mere, boy! Who's a good boy, who's a good boy-?$12
Entries.companion_Custom_ESHouse1: Baron Munchington! My favorite monarch, where is he? C'mere, Munchie-!$12
Entries.companion_Custom_Yri_House: Oh, hang on. While we're here, I have to give Nala kisses and pets. Very important.$12
Entries.companion_Custom_ExteriorMuseum: You can't pet fish, @. That would be silly.$9
Entries.companion_Custom_FishMuseum: Alright, that goldfish behind the counter looks VERY cute. Would probably get us in trouble if I tried to pet her, though.$9
Entries.companion_Custom_SVE: PUPPY fish? Those I can pet. Right?$12
Entries.companion_Custom_EnchantedGrove: A grove?... this reminds me of I dream I had. About Hector, actually. In a similar place... but a little more sickly... I wonder if he's alright.$4
Entries.companion_Custom_Highlands: Hm... this looks like Lance's stomping grounds. Haven't seen him in... I don't even remember how long.$17#$b#I wonder how the First Slash is doing. I should catch up with that lot, considering I ran with them while I was in the Fern Islands.$19
Entries.companion_Custom_CastleVillageOutpost: I don't miss taking up watch while trying to cram for college. That was a rough time.$19
Entries.companion_Custom_DesertRailway: Just be careful, @. We're about to head straight into a sort of hellscape unlike anything you've ever seen before.$17
Entries.companion_Custom_IridiumQuarry: Holy shit, that is a LOT of Iridium.$13
Entries.companion_Custom_TreasureCave: Where there's reward, there's risk... just watch your back, @. You don't know what we're going to run into - have you ever heard of a Mimic?$19
Entries.heal: Hey, @. Stay still. Let me get that patched up for you.$17
Entries.nomedkits: @, be really careful. I'm out of tonics.$4
Entries.heal_Dating: Just stay still, take a breath. It'll be okay, I promise.$19
Entries.nomedkits_Dating: @, I'm out of medkits. Are you okay? Should we turn back?$5
Entries.heal_Spouse: I'll be gentle, @. Stay still. I'll get you right as rain, okay?$19
Entries.nomedkits_Spouse: Sunshine, I'm out of tonics. Maybe we should turn back, I couldn't stand anything happening to you and not being able to help.$17
